snippet: Pre-race favorite Romain Bardet has been disqualified from the Paris-Nice after being towed by his team car following a crash on the opening stage, organizers said on Sunday....

headline.main: Holy Smokes! Israel Takes Step Toward Marijuana Reforms
headline.print_headline: Holy Smokes! Israel Takes Step Toward Marijuana Reforms

lead_paragraph: Pre-race favorite Romain Bardet has been disqualified from the Paris-Nice after being towed by his team car following a crash on the opening stage, organizers said on Sunday.
